output.sentences: This weekend I'm going to go visit my favorite site downtown.
I walked by the statues in the park.
I stopped for a while to take photos of a local hotel.
Then I met my friend in a park for lunch
After lunch and taking photos of my favorite local sites, I finally made it to my destination.
